name: Cat Sweeper (gnevesdev)
description:
Description

A game about cats and also a clone of Minesweeper.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 Compo, in 2 days.

Gameplay

You control a cat trying to go deeper and deeper into the ground, but there's bombs everywhere! Fortunately, each ground-block has a number that tells you how many bombs are surrounding it. If you are smart enough, you can cave deeper.

Development

Made with C (and it's very optimized).

Game source: https://github.com/gnevesdev/cat-sweeper
Bug reporting: https://github.com/gnevesdev/cat-sweeper/issues
